about_the_game:
A CLASSIC JRPG FEEL


Inspired by classic JRPGs like Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest, Spire will immerse you in its engaging story about a boy lost in a forgotten world. Placing his trust in a Spirit Guide this boy will partake on an epic journey to get back home.

BEAUTIFULLY IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE


As you traverse the forgotten lands of this alternate world you’ll engage in a beautifully immersive experience that will leave you lost in this new universe.

FAST AND FLUID COMBAT


Enjoy fast, fluid and responsive combat as you fight your way through hordes of unique enemies and bosses!

UNIQUE GAMEPLAY STYLE


Your spirit guide will play three key roles in your journey throughout this game:

  • Sword
The spirit guide will transform from its fox form to its sword form which you can use in battle

  • Healer
When you find yourself low on health you can switch your spirit guide back to its fox form which will replenish your health over time

  • Compass
During your journey the fox will guide you in an effort to help you get back home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB NVIDIA GeForce 6800 series or ATI Radeon X800 series or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit

short_description: A boy lost in a forgotten world whose only chance home is by trusting in a spirit guide. Explore this vast new universe while vanquishing foes using your guide as your weapon, healer and compass. Will you be able to get back home?
